sourcesContent:
Welcome to Our Accessible Website

Key Features

Accessible Navigation

Fully keyboard-accessible navigation with ARIA labels and skip links.

Semantic HTML

Properly structured content using semantic HTML elements.

Responsive Design

Fully responsive layout that works on all device sizes.

Featured Products

Ergonomic Keyboard

Enhanced visibility and comfort for extended use

$89

Adaptive Mouse

Customizable buttons and smooth tracking

$65

Shopping Cart

  • {{item.name}}

    ${{item.price}}

    {{item.quantity}}

Total: ${{cartTotal}}

Your cart is empty

Get Started

Interactive Dropdown Example

  • Option 1
  • Option 2
  • Option 3
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { isDropdownOpen = false; selectedOption = ''; constructor(private router: Router) {} navigateToProducts(): void { this.router.navigate(['/products']); } toggleDropdown(): void { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; } selectOption(option: string): void { this.selectedOption = option; this.isDropdownOpen = false; // Announce selection to screen readers const announcement = document.createElement('div'); announcement.setAttribute('aria-live', 'polite'); announcement.textContent = `Selected option: ${option}`; document.body.appendChild(announcement); setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(announcement), 1000); } // Close dropdown when clicking outside onDocumentClick(event: MouseEvent): void { if (!(event.target as HTMLElement).closest('.custom-dropdown')) { this.isDropdownOpen = false; } } }
